info.speedDesc: Take a quick typing test and instantly see your WPM, accuracy, and percentile ranking among typists worldwide.
info.trackDesc: Earn XP, level up through 10 ranks, unlock achievements, and maintain daily streaks as you improve.
info.langDesc: Practice in English, Korean, Chinese, Japanese, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, or Russian.
info.tip1: Focus on accuracy first â€” speed follows naturally once you build muscle memory. Aim for 95%+ accuracy.
info.tip2: Use proper home row placement (ASDF JKL;) and reach for keys without looking at the keyboard.
info.tip3: Practice 10â€“15 minutes daily. Short, consistent sessions beat occasional long ones.
info.tip4: Use the keyboard heatmap and weak key lessons to target your specific problem areas.
info.benchmarkNote: The average office worker types around 40 WPM. With regular practice on DuckType, most people reach 80+ WPM within a few months.
info.howWpmDesc: WPM (Words Per Minute) is the standard measure of typing speed. Each "word" is standardized to 5 characters including spaces, ensuring fair comparison across languages and word lengths.
info.improveDesc: Try our structured typing lessons or practice your weak keys to boost your speed and accuracy.

onboarding.title: Welcome to DuckType!
onboarding.subtitle: Here's everything you can do
onboarding.featTypingDesc: Measure your WPM, accuracy, and track your progress
onboarding.featDailyDesc: A new challenge every day â€” build your streak!
onboarding.featLessonsDesc: 8 structured lessons from home row to full keyboard
onboarding.featAdventureDesc: A typing RPG! Battle monsters, defeat bosses, and conquer worlds â€” all by typing fast and accurately.
onboarding.rankEvolution: Your duck evolves as you level up!
onboarding.unlockItems: Unlock new items as you level up
onboarding.loginFree: 100% free â€” no credit card needed

v263.title: Accuracy & Language Bug Fixes
v263.item1: Accuracy Fix â€” Spaces are now counted as correct keystrokes, fixing inaccurate accuracy percentages.
v263.item2: German Capitalization â€” German nouns are now properly capitalized (Nacht, Boden, Luft, etc.).
v263.item3: Time Mode Fix â€” Untyped characters in the last word are no longer counted as errors when time runs out.
v263.thanks: Special thanks to noti for reporting these bugs! ðŸ¦†

v262.title: SEO & Accessibility Improvements
v262.item1: Accessibility â€” Reduced motion support, larger touch targets, screen reader labels, and keyboard navigation for all interactive elements.
v262.item2: Security â€” Added security headers (X-Content-Type-Options, X-Frame-Options, Referrer-Policy) and PWA manifest.
v262.item3: SEO â€” 404 page, blog Open Graph images, updated sitemap, and improved structured data.

v261.title: Results Screen Upgrades
v261.item1: Achievement Progress â€” Results screen now shows your overall achievement progress and next goal.
v261.item2: Leaderboard Prompt â€” See your percentile ranking and jump to the leaderboard from results.

v260.title: Retention & Engagement Boost
v260.item1: Daily Challenge Hook â€” Results screen now shows your Daily Challenge status and streak to keep you coming back.
v260.item2: Streak Milestones â€” Earn bonus XP at 3, 7, 14, and 30-day streaks! Don't break the chain.
v260.item3: First Test Nudge â€” New players see a personalized sign-up prompt showing their earned XP.
v260.item4: Adventure Glow â€” The Adventure Mode button now pulses with an inviting glow animation.

v251.title: Leaderboard Daily Refresh
v251.item1: Dynamic Rankings â€” Leaderboard rankings now shift daily, keeping the competition fresh and lively.

v250.title: Performance & Code Refactoring
v250.item1: Lazy Loading â€” Heavy page components now load on demand, reducing initial bundle size for faster startup.
v250.item2: Code Splitting â€” CombatScene, App.tsx, and shared logic reorganized into smaller, focused modules.
v250.item3: Custom Hooks â€” Font loading and URL parsing extracted into reusable hooks for cleaner architecture.

v240.title: DuckType Blog
v240.item1: Typing Blog â€” 20 expert articles covering typing tips, keyboard guides, WPM explained, ergonomics, and more.
v240.item2: SEO & Discoverability â€” Blog articles are fully static HTML for maximum search engine visibility.

v230.title: Adventure Mode Visual Upgrade
v230.item1: Custom Player Sprite â€” The player duck now uses a hand-drawn character image instead of an emoji.
v230.item2: New Monster Names â€” World 1 monsters have been renamed with unique personalities (Speedy Fox, Pumba, Rascal Raccoon, and more).
v230.item3: Combat Animations â€” Player bounces on wave clear and glows with a purple poison aura in World 2.

v220.title: Profile WPM Trend Chart
v220.item1: WPM Trend Chart â€” See how your typing speed has changed over your recent tests with a line chart on your profile page.

v211.title: Adventure Mode Mobile Optimization
v211.item1: Mobile Combat Layout â€” Compact HUD and reduced padding during combat for maximum game field visibility on mobile.
v211.item2: Virtual Keyboard Auto-Scroll â€” Input field automatically scrolls into view when the virtual keyboard opens.
v211.item3: Combat Header Auto-Hide â€” Header and footer automatically hide during adventure combat to maximize screen space.

v210.title: Daily Boost & Smart Keyboard Detection
v210.item1: Daily XP Boost (1.5x) â€” Complete the daily challenge to earn 1.5x XP on all tests for the rest of the day! Start your day right.
v210.item2: Keyboard Mismatch Warning â€” Automatically detects when your input method doesn't match the test language and shows a helpful reminder to switch.

v200.title: Adventure Mode â€” Typing RPG is here!
v200.item1: World 1: Duck Village â€” 8 stages + Shadow Wolf boss. Defend the village with the power of typing!
v200.item2: World 2: Venom Jungle â€” 9 stages + Giant Viper boss. Survive the poison that drains your HP every second!
v200.item3: 3 Difficulty Tiers â€” Beginner, Intermediate, Expert. Each cleared difficulty earns more stars and XP.
v200.item4: Boss Death Animation â€” Bosses shake, shatter and scream "QUACK!!" when defeated, with cinematic victory scenes.
v200.item5: Cinematic Endings â€” Unique story cinematics after each world boss. "Peace has returned to Duck Village..."
v200.item6: Difficulty Progression â€” Beat the boss to unlock the next difficulty tier. Master all 3 to fully conquer each world!
v200.item7: Share Your Victories â€” Share your adventure results with friends on X, KakaoTalk, WhatsApp, and more. Earn +35 XP daily!

adventure.worldDesc: Wolves are invading the duck village! Defend your home with the power of typing.
adventure.defeatMsg: The duck warrior has fallen... Try again!
